usercssData.name: ANN Dark Theme
usercssData.author: Slick Boy D
usercssData.description: Darker look for AnimeNewsNetwork that's easier on the eyes.The whole site is aligned in the center now.

author: Slick Boy D
description: Darker look for AnimeNewsNetwork that's easier on the eyes.The whole site is aligned in the center now.
name: ANN Dark Theme

sourceCode:
us = "Lunar Duck v2.2.1 üå∏ sabakuran"

/* ==UserStyle==
@name         nyaa.si - Lunar Duck
@namespace    sabakuran
@description  DDG inspired theme for nyaa.si
@author       sabakuran (https://github.com/sabakuran)
@homepageURL  https://github.com/sabakuran/personal-stylesheets
@supportURL   https://github.com/sabakuran/personal-stylesheets/issues
@updateURL    https://userstyles.world/api/style/1397.user.css
@preprocessor stylus
@version      2.2.1
@license      WTFPL
===================
@var select cs "Color scheme" {
    "Default*":"cs-dark",
    "Miku":"cs-cyan",
    "Luka":"cs-pink",
    "Rin":"cs-yellow",
    "Teto":"cs-red",
    "Gumi":"cs-green",
    "Kaito":"cs-blue",
}
@var checkbox xdarkbtn "Hide dark mode toggle" 1
@var checkbox navstick "Enable sticky navbar" 1
@var checkbox avarnd "Enable rounded avatars" 1
@var checkbox imgshad "Enable image shadows" 1
@var checkbox avashad "Enable avatar shadows" 1
@var select imgsat "Image saturation" {
  "Greyscale":"0%",
  "10%":"10%",
  "20%":"20%",
  "30%":"30%",
  "40%":"40%",
  "Half":"50%",
  "60%":"60%",
  "70%":"70%",
  "80%":"80%",
  "90%":"90%",
  "Default*":"100%"
}
@var select avasat "Avatar saturation" {
  "Greyscale":"0%",
  "10%":"10%",
  "20%":"20%",
  "30%":"30%",
  "40%":"40%",
  "Half":"50%",
  "60%":"60%",
  "70%":"70%",
  "80%":"80%",
  "90%":"90%",
  "Default*":"100%"
}
@var select density "Table density" {
    "Default*":"none",
    "Comfortable":"10px",
    "Compact":"dens-compact"
}
@var select prad "Rounded corners" {
  "None":"0",
  "Default*":"4px",
  "8px":"8px",
  "12px":"12px"
}
@var checkbox xcw "Adjust container width" 0
@var range cw "Container width" [1400, 1150, 1900, 10,"px"]
@var checkbox xus "Show userstyle attribution" 1
==/UserStyle== */

@-moz-document regexp("https?:\\/\\/(.+\\.)?(nyaa|fap(?!\\.lol))\\.(si|lol|iss\\.(one|ink))\\/.*")
  
  i = !important
  
  :root
    --txt hsla(0, 0%, 100%, .8)
    --txt-act hsl(0, 0%, 100%)
    --txt-sub hsla(0, 0%, 100%, .5)
    --txt-ph hsla(0, 0%, 100%, .3)
    --txt-succ hsl(150, 50%, 50%)
    --txt-succ-act hsl(150, 50%, 80%)
    --bg-succ hsl(150, 30%, 20%)
    --txt-warn hsl(35, 50%, 50%)
    --bg-warn hsl(35, 30%, 20%)
    --txt-dang hsl(360, 50%, 50%)
    --bg-dang hsl(360, 30%, 20%)
    --txt-info hsl(225, 50%, 50%)
    --bg-info hsl(225, 30%, 20%)
    if cs == "cs-dark"
      --bg-1 hsl(0, 0%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(0, 0%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(0, 0%, 15%)
      --bg-4 hsl(0, 0%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(0, 0%, 25%)
      --bg-6 hsl(0, 0%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(225, 100%, 70%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(225, 100%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-pink"
      --bg-1 hsl(315, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(315, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(325, 20%, 20%)
      --bg-4 hsl(330, 15%, 25%)
      --bg-5 hsl(330, 15%, 30%)
      --bg-6 hsl(330, 15%, 50%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(335, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(335, 45%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-cyan"
      --bg-1 hsl(185, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(185, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(185, 100%, 10%)
      --bg-4 hsl(185, 30%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(185, 15%, 40%)
      --bg-6 hsl(185, 30%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(190, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(190, 45%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-yellow"
      --bg-1 hsl(50, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(50, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(50, 100%, 10%)
      --bg-4 hsl(50, 30%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(50, 15%, 40%)
      --bg-6 hsl(50, 30%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(50, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(50, 45%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-red"
      --bg-1 hsl(0, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(0, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(0, 100%, 10%)
      --bg-4 hsl(0, 30%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(0, 15%, 40%)
      --bg-6 hsl(0, 30%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(0, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(0, 45%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-green"
      --bg-1 hsl(140, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(140, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(140, 100%, 10%)
      --bg-4 hsl(140, 30%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(140, 15%, 40%)
      --bg-6 hsl(140, 30%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(140, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(140, 45%, 80%)
    else if cs == "cs-blue"
      --bg-1 hsl(200, 20%, 10%)
      --bg-2 hsl(200, 20%, 5%)
      --bg-3 hsl(200, 100%, 10%)
      --bg-4 hsl(200, 30%, 20%)
      --bg-5 hsl(200, 15%, 40%)
      --bg-6 hsl(200, 30%, 45%)
      --txt-lnk hsl(200, 45%, 60%)
      --txt-lnk-act hsl(200, 45%, 80%)

  pan1()
    background-color var(--bg-1)
    color var(--txt)
  shad()
    box-shadow 0 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .5)
  rad()
    border-radius prad
  sharad()
    shad()
    rad()
    
  // scrollbar
  html
    // chromium
    ::-webkit-scrollbar
      width 15px
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track
      background-color var(--bg-2)
      border-left 1px solid var(--bg-3)
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
      background-color var(--bg-4)
      border-radius 0
      &:hover
        background-color var(--bg-6)
    // firefox
    scrollbar-color var(--bg-4) var(--bg-2)
    scrollbar-width auto
    
  // adjust container width
  if xcw
    .container
      width cw
  
  // torrentlist adjust padding
  .table > tbody > tr > th, .table > tfoot > tr > th, .table > thead > tr > td, .table > tbody > tr > td, .table > tfoot > tr > td
  table.torrent-list td:first-child
    if density == "dens-compact"
      padding 0 5px 0 5px
    padding density
      
  // workaround for table border radius
  th:first-child
    border-top-left-radius prad - 6px
  th:last-child
    border-top-right-radius prad -6px
  tr:last-child td:last-child
    border-bottom-right-radius prad - 6px
  tr:last-child td:first-child
    border-bottom-left-radius prad - 6px
      
  body
    pan1()
  a
    color var(--txt-lnk)
    &:hover, &:focus
      color var(--txt-lnk-act)
      text-decoration none
      outline none // for cats in search
  blockquote
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-1)
    border-left 5px solid var(--bg-5)
  pre
    pan1()
    sharad()
    border-color var(--bg-1)
  code
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-5)
    color var(--txt)
  pre code
    box-shadow none
  kbd
    sharad()
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-4)
  hr
    border-top 1px solid var(--bg-4)
  
  // navbar
  .navbar
    shad()
  .navbar-inverse
    background-color var(--bg-2)
    border-color var(--bg-3)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-brand
    color var(--txt)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:focus
    color var(--txt-act)
    background-color transparent
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a
    color var(--txt)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:focus
    background-color transparent
    color var(--txt-act)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .active > a, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .active > a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .active > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    color var(--txt-act)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    color var(--txt-act)
  // navbar mobile
  .navbar-toggle
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    rad()
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle
    border-color var(--bg-4)
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle:focus
    background-color var(--bg-6)
  // dropdown menu
  .dropdown-menu
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-3)
    li a
      color var(--txt)
  .dropdown-menu > li > a:hover, .dropdown-menu > li > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-5)
    color var(--txt)
  .dropdown-menu > .active > a, .dropdown-menu > .active > a:hover, .dropdown-menu > .active > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-5)
    color var(--txt)
  .bootstrap-select .dropdown-toggle:focus
    outline none i
  // searchbar
  .form-control
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-4)
    transition none
    &:focus
      box-shadow none
      border-color var(--bg-4)
  .form-control::placeholder
    color var(--txt-ph)
    opacity 1 // firefox
  .form-control.search-bar
    box-shadow none
  .form-control[disabled], .form-control[readonly], fieldset[disabled] .form-control
    background-color var(--bg-3)
  .input-group .form-control:last-child, .input-group-addon:last-child
    border 1px solid var(--bg-3)
  .navbar-form .input-group
    shad()
  .input-group-btn .btn // suppress shadow in search button
    box-shadow none
  #navFilter-criteria > .bootstrap-select:first-child > button
    border-top-left-radius prad i
    border-bottom-left-radius prad i
    
  // make navbar sticky
  if navstick
    .navbar
      position sticky
      top 0
    
  // buttons
  .btn
    rad()
  .btn-default
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt)
    border-color var(--bg-4)
  .btn-default:hover, .btn-default:active:hover, .btn-default.active:hover, .btn-default:active, .btn-default.active, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-default, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-default:hover, .btn-default:active:focus, .btn-default.active:focus, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-default:focus, .btn-default:active.focus, .btn-default.active.focus, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-default.focus
    background-color var(--bg-6)
    color var(--txt)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-6)
  .btn-default:focus, .btn-default.focus
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt)
    border: 1px solid var(--bg-4)
    &:hover
      background-color var(--bg-6)
  .btn:focus, .btn:active:focus, .btn.active:focus, .btn.focus, .btn:active.focus, .btn.active.focus
    outline none
  .btn-primary
    shad()
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-4)
  .btn-primary:hover, .btn-primary:active:hover, .btn-primary.active:hover, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-primary:hover, .btn-primary:active:focus, .btn-primary.active:focus, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-primary:focus, .btn-primary:active.focus, .btn-primary.active.focus, .open > .dropdown-toggle.btn-primary.focus, .btn-primary:focus, .btn-primary.focus
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-6)
    border: 1px solid var(--bg-6)
  
  // pagination
  .pagination
    shad()
  .pagination-page-info
    margin-top 20px
  .pagination > li > a, .pagination > li > span
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt)
    border 0
  .pagination > li:first-child > a, .pagination > li:first-child > span
    border-top-left-radius prad
    border-bottom-left-radius prad
  .pagination > li:last-child > a, .pagination > li:last-child > span
    border-top-right-radius prad
    border-bottom-right-radius prad
  .pagination > .disabled > span, .pagination > .disabled > span:hover, .pagination > .disabled > span:focus, .pagination > .disabled > a, .pagination > .disabled > a:hover, .pagination > .disabled > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-3)
  .pagination > .active > a, .pagination > .active > span, .pagination > .active > a:hover, .pagination > .active > span:hover, .pagination > .active > a:focus, .pagination > .active > span:focus
    background-color var(--bg-5)
  .pagination > li > a:hover, .pagination > li > span:hover, .pagination > li > a:focus, .pagination > li > span:focus
    background-color var(--bg-6)
    color var(--txt)
    
  // table
  // torrent list odd row
  .table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(2n+1)
    background-color var(--bg-3)
  // torrent list remake
  .table > thead > tr > td.danger, .table > tbody > tr > td.danger, .table > tfoot > tr > td.danger, .table > thead > tr > th.danger, .table > tbody > tr > th.danger, .table > tfoot > tr > th.danger, .table > thead > tr.danger > td, .table > tbody > tr.danger > td, .table > tfoot > tr.danger > td, .table > thead > tr.danger > th, .table > tbody > tr.danger > th, .table > tfoot > tr.danger > th
    background-color var(--bg-dang)
  // torrent list trusted
  .table > thead > tr > td.success, .table > tbody > tr > td.success, .table > tfoot > tr > td.success, .table > thead > tr > th.success, .table > tbody > tr > th.success, .table > tfoot > tr > th.success, .table > thead > tr.success > td, .table > tbody > tr.success > td, .table > tfoot > tr.success > td, .table > thead > tr.success > th, .table > tbody > tr.success > th, .table > tfoot > tr.success > th
    background-color var(--bg-succ)
  // torrent list comments
  table.torrent-list tbody .comments
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt) i
    border 1px solid var(--bg-4)
  // torrent list borders
  .table
    margin-bottom 0
  .table-bordered
    border 5px solid var(--bg-3)
  .table-responsive
    sharad()
  @media screen and (max-width: 991px)
    .table-responsive
      border 5px solid var(--bg-3)    
  .table-bordered > thead > tr > th, .table-bordered > tbody > tr > th, .table-bordered > tfoot > tr > th, .table-bordered > thead > tr > td, .table-bordered > tbody > tr > td, .table-bordered > tfoot > tr > td
    border 0
  // torrent list suppress visited link state
  table.torrent-list tbody tr td a:visited
    color var(--txt-lnk)
    &:hover, &:focus
      color var(--txt-lnk-act)
  // selection highlighting
  .table-hover > tbody > tr:hover,
  .table-hover > tbody > tr > td.danger:hover, .table-hover > tbody > tr > th.danger:hover, .table-hover > tbody > tr.danger:hover > td, .table-hover > tbody > tr:hover > .danger, .table-hover > tbody > tr.danger:hover > th,
  .table-hover > tbody > tr > td.success:hover, .table-hover > tbody > tr > th.success:hover, .table-hover > tbody > tr.success:hover > td, .table-hover > tbody > tr:hover > .success, .table-hover > tbody > tr.success:hover > th
    background-color var(--bg-5)
  // torrent description
  #torrent-description .table-bordered
    sharad()
    border 5px solid var(--bg-4)
    border-collapse separate
  #torrent-description .table-bordered thead
    background-color var(--bg-1)
  #torrent-description .table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(2n+1)
    background-color var(--bg-4)
  #torrent-description .table
    margin-bottom 20px
  
  // seed/leech colors
  // individual torrent meta
  .col-md-5 span[style="color: green;"]
    color var(--txt-succ) i
  .col-md-5 span[style="color: red;"]
    color var(--txt-dang) i
  // torrent list
  table.torrent-list td:nth-child(6), body.dark table.torrent-list > tbody > tr.success > td:nth-child(6), body.dark table.torrent-list > tbody > tr.danger > td:nth-child(6)
    color var(--txt-succ)
  table.torrent-list td:nth-child(7), body.dark table.torrent-list > tbody > tr.success > td:nth-child(7), body.dark table.torrent-list > tbody > tr.danger > td:nth-child(7)
    color var(--txt-dang)
    
  // panels
  .panel
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-3)
  .panel-default
    border-color var(--bg-3)
  .panel-success
    border-color var(--bg-succ)
  .panel-danger
    border-color var(--bg-dang)
  // panel headings
  .panel-heading
    border-top-right-radius prad
    border-top-left-radius prad
  .panel-default .panel-heading
    shad()
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    color var(--txt)
    border-color var(--bg-3)
  .panel-success .panel-heading
    shad()
    background-color var(--bg-succ)
    color var(--txt-succ)
    border-color var(--bg-succ)
  .panel-danger .panel-heading
    shad()
    background-color var(--bg-dang)
    color var(--txt-dang)
    border-color var(--bg-dang)
  // panel footer
  .panel-footer
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    border-top 1px solid var(--bg-3)
    border-bottom-right-radius prad
    border-bottom-left-radius prad
    
  // notification panels
  .alert-info
    background-color var(--bg-info)
    color var(--txt-info)
    border-color var(--bg-info)
  // comment panels
  .comment-panel
    shad()
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    border-color var(--bg-4)
  // targeted comment (if user clicks on timestamp)
  .comment-panel:target
    shad()
    background-color var(--bg-info)
    border-color var(--bg-info)
  
  // category icons
  .category-icon
    filter saturate(50%)
    
  // submitter colors
  .text-success
    color var(--txt-succ)
    &:hover, &:focus
      color var(--txt-succ-act) i
  
  // upload page
  // markdown preview
  .well
    sharad()
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-3)
  .well blockquote
    border-color var(--bg-5)
  .well .table-bordered
    sharad()
    border 5px solid var(--bg-4)
    border-collapse separate
  .well .table-bordered thead
    background-color var(--bg-1)
  .well .table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(2n+1)
    background-color var(--bg-4)
  .well .table
    margin-bottom 20px
  .well img
    rad()
    box-shadow none
  // input
  #description.form-control
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-3)
    border-radius 0px prad prad prad
  .nav-tabs
    border-bottom 0
  .nav-tabs > li.active > a, .nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, .nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus
    shad()
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-3)
    border-bottom-color var(--bg-3)
    border 1px solid var(--bg-3)
    z-index -1
  .nav-tabs > li > a
    border-radius prad prad 0 0
  .nav-tabs > li > a:hover
    border-color var(--bg-3)
  .nav > li > a:hover, .nav > li > a:focus
    background-color var(--bg-2)
  // buttons
  .btn-danger
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-dang)
    border-color var(--bg-dang)
  .btn-warning
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-warn)
    border-color var(--bg-warn)
  .btn-grey
    color var(--txt)
    background-color var(--bg-4)
    border-color var(--bg-4)
  
  // images
  // torrent description
  #torrent-description img
    rad()
    box-shadow none
  // user avatars
  .avatar
    rad()
    box-shadow none
  .comment-content img
    rad()
    box-shadow none
  // round avatars
  if avarnd
    .avatar
      border-radius 100%
  // adjust image saturation
  #torrent-description img, .comment-content img, .well img
    filter saturate(imgsat)
  .avatar
    filter saturate(avasat)
  // img box shadows
  if imgshad
    #torrent-description img, .comment-content img, .well img
      shad()
  if avashad
    .avatar
      shad()
    
  // dark mode toggle visibility
  if xdarkbtn
    footer p
      visibility hidden

  // rotating color animation
  @keyframes rainbow
    0%
      color hsl(335, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(335, 45%, 60%)
    10%
      color hsl(225, 100%, 70%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(225, 100%, 70%)
    20%
      color hsl(190, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(190, 45%, 60%)
    30%
      color hsl(50, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(50, 45%, 60%)
    40%
      color hsl(0, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(0, 45%, 60%)
    50%
      color hsl(140, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(140, 45%, 60%)
    60%
      color hsl(200, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(200, 45%, 60%)
    70%
      color hsl(35, 60%, 40%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(35, 60%, 40%)
    80%
      color hsl(10, 70%, 70%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(10, 70%, 70%)
    90%
      color hsl(50, 100%, 50%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(50, 100%, 50%)
    100%
      color hsl(335, 45%, 60%)
      text-shadow 0 0 10px hsl(335, 45%, 60%)

  // show userstyle attribution
  if xus
    footer::before
      content us
      font-weight bold
      animation rainbow 5s infinite
author: sabakuran (https://github.com/sabakuran)
name: nyaa.si - Lunar Duck

usercssData.name: SensCritique Dark v2
usercssData.description: Nouvelle version du th√®me "SensCritique - Th√®me Sombre".
usercssData.author: alxmtr

author: alxmtr
description: Nouvelle version du th√®me "SensCritique - Th√®me Sombre".
name: SensCritique Dark v2
